name: fluent-check
description: A type-safe fluent-based property based checker natively written for Typescript

scripts.evidence:generate: npx tsx scripts/evidence/calibration.study.ts && npx tsx scripts/evidence/detection.study.ts && npx tsx scripts/evidence/efficiency.study.ts && npx tsx scripts/evidence/exists.study.ts && npx tsx scripts/evidence/shrinking.study.ts && npx tsx scripts/evidence/double-negation.study.ts
scripts.evidence: npm run evidence:generate && npm run evidence:analyze
scripts.evidence:quick: QUICK_MODE=1 npm run evidence:generate && npm run evidence:analyze
scripts.evidence:biased-sampling: npx tsx scripts/evidence/biased-sampling.study.ts && cd analysis && source .venv/bin/activate && python biased_sampling.py
scripts.evidence:weighted-union: npx tsx scripts/evidence/weighted-union.study.ts && cd analysis && source .venv/bin/activate && python weighted_union.py
scripts.evidence:corner-case-coverage: npx tsx scripts/evidence/corner-case-coverage.study.ts && cd analysis && source .venv/bin/activate && python corner_case_coverage.py
scripts.evidence:filter-cascade: npx tsx scripts/evidence/filter-cascade.study.ts && cd analysis && source .venv/bin/activate && python filter_cascade.py
scripts.evidence:chained-distribution: npx tsx scripts/evidence/chained-distribution.study.ts && cd analysis && source .venv/bin/activate && python chained_distribution.py
scripts.evidence:shrinking-fairness: npx tsx scripts/evidence/shrinking-fairness.study.ts && cd analysis && source .venv/bin/activate && python shrinking_fairness.py
scripts.evidence:length-distribution: npx tsx scripts/evidence/length-distribution.study.ts && cd analysis && source .venv/bin/activate && python length_distribution.py
scripts.evidence:caching-tradeoff: npx tsx scripts/evidence/caching-tradeoff.study.ts && cd analysis && source .venv/bin/activate && python caching_tradeoff.py
scripts.evidence:streaming-accuracy: npx tsx scripts/evidence/streaming-accuracy.study.ts && cd analysis && source .venv/bin/activate && python streaming_accuracy.py
scripts.evidence:sample-budget: npx tsx scripts/evidence/sample-budget.study.ts && cd analysis && source .venv/bin/activate && python sample_budget.py
scripts.evidence:deduplication: npx tsx scripts/evidence/deduplication.study.ts && cd analysis && source .venv/bin/activate && python deduplication.py
scripts.evidence:mapped-size: npx tsx scripts/evidence/mapped-size.study.ts && cd analysis && source .venv/bin/activate && python mapped_size.py
scripts.evidence:shrinking-strategies: npx tsx scripts/evidence/shrinking-strategies-comparison.study.ts && cd analysis && source .venv/bin/activate && python shrinking_strategies_comparison.py
scripts.evidence:apparatus: npm run evidence:biased-sampling && npm run evidence:weighted-union && npm run evidence:corner-case-coverage && npm run evidence:filter-cascade && npm run evidence:deduplication && npm run evidence:mapped-size && npm run evidence:chained-distribution && npm run evidence:shrinking-fairness && npm run evidence:shrinking-strategies && npm run evidence:length-distribution && npm run evidence:caching-tradeoff && npm run evidence:streaming-accuracy && npm run evidence:sample-budget

author: André Restivo, Hugo Sereno Ferreira, Rui Gonçalves
